title: Textile, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
description: Blue taffeta with deeply curving serpentines in warp of the ground fabric. Between serpentines, in horizontal rows, figure of a man playing a clarinet, alternating with a bird on a slender branch. Alternate horizontal rows have sprays of flowers. Design brocaded in silver metal thread with outlines in red silk brocade.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). Gift of Mrs. Montgomery Hare. 1932-11-11.
